name: Storm Clicker
description:
Escape the storm in under 3 MINUTES!!!


Storm Clicker is a casual clicker. 

Gather enough supplies to progress through the rooms and ensure your safety in the basement!!

[CONTROLS]

  • Mouse
  • Your Carpal Tunnel Syndrome

[COMMENTARY]

This is the first ever game I ever finish!! My friend Fred Becker helped me program it and it took us a while, but it's here at last!! It was super fun to make this!

If you have any feedback, it's welcome! Tell us what you liked, what you didn't like; any comments/suggestions are welcome! If any bugs happen we'll do our best to update it soon. Thank you!

If you'd like to support us, please check out our social media below and follow us!
